titles: The humble addresse of the Lord Maior, Aldermen and Common-Council of the city of London, on Tuesday last, being the 9th of this instant August to the Council of State together with the Lord Whitlock's speech in answer thereunto : wherein is discovered the state of the affairs in Cheshire, Lancashire, Yorkshire, Kent, Suffex and Surrey, and several other parts of the nation.
author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Whitlocke, Bulstrode, 1605-1675 or 6.
notes: Caption title, p. 4: The speech of the Lord Whitlock made in the Council Chamber at White-Hall.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660 --  Sources.
Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1649-1660 --  Sources.
